title: mahAtmA gAndhi
sahitya:
mahAtmA gAndhi oruvarE inda maNDalam tOnrina nAL mudal gAndhi


anupallavi

  taghAdavarai candran indran enru sadA pugazh shol izhukkaghala uNmai


caraNam    tanakkena vAzhAda sAtvika guNa dhIran tan uDal poruL Avi mannuyirk-kupakAran
 sakala uyirum inbuTrirukka kanavu kaNDAn enbum
 ulagirkkellAm paghirndaLittoLi koNDAn
 sattiyamODahimsai iraNDAyudam kaikkoNDAn caritrattilum engum kaNDu kETTariyOm
